params.name: linkableElementsQuery
description: (Optional) Selector used to find the nodes which can be selected by the user.

params.name: modalPrimaryButtonLabel
params.description: (Optional) The label for the primary button. Defaults to `t__Insert`.

params.name: modalTitle
params.description: (Optional) The title being shown at the top of the modal. Defaults to `t__Select an element`.

params.name: documentId
description: (Optional) The document id of the document which should be preselected.
This option is commonly used when the modal is used in an edit flow.
Should only be used in combination with nodeId

params.name: nodeId
description: (Optional) The node which should be preselected in the preselected document.
This option is commonly used when the modal is used in an edit flow.
Should only be used in combination with documentId

returns.name: documentId
returns.description: The documentId of the document where the selected node is in.

returns.name: nodeId
returns.description: The nodeId of the selected node.
